cause.description:
Chris Bartley is quitting smoking again, .. M0NDAY is day one !
send him some supportive vibes ..
1. Smoking is Bad for your Health
2. Smoking smells and tastes TERRiBLE
3. Do it for the girl man..
cause.mission: help Chris Bartley give up the smokes for g00d
cause.name: Help Chris Stop Smoking
